plot: In Vietnam, a US soldier is on a dangerous mission to destroy a radio installation. After being wounded , he encounters a Viet Cong soldier. They are forced to work together as they fight for survival.
title: On My Honor
plot_es: In Vietnam, a US soldier is on a dangerous mission to destroy a radio installation. After being wounded , he encounters a Viet Cong soldier. They are forced to work together as they fight for survival.
plot_en: In Vietnam, a US soldier is on a dangerous mission to destroy a radio installation. After being wounded , he encounters a Viet Cong soldier. They are forced to work together as they fight for survival.
